Name: Leta Adventure
About the game: Through Spring, Autumn, Winter and Summer! Leta Adventure is a relaxing role-playing game where you must travel a journey in order to deliver a letter. In this RPG, you take the role of 'Leta'. To progress your journey, you must fulfill the various tasks given to you and chat with everyone you see! Featuring many different locations, minigames and characters to meet... your Adventure awaits!
